Title: Try All Pony Classes
Body: Be sure to try out all the classes of ponies! Each one has different powers and abilities.

Title: Prepare Before A Quest
Body: Consumables, boosts, and other items can give you the edge against tough enemies. Make sure to stock up before starting a quest!

Title: Use Cooldowns Wisely
Body: Powerful spells have cooldowns preventing how often they can be used. Use cooldowns wisely to defeat stronger enemies.
